description: PURCHASE OF DOLISSE FOR FISHERIES AND OCEANS CANADA
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title**
F3731-230100 Manufacture and Delivery of Dolosse to Étang-du-Nord, Îles-de-la-Madeleine

## Tender Details

* Reference Number: WS4289492712-Doc4289560185
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: WS4289492712
* Publication Date: November 15, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 6, 2023, 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: November 16, 2023

## Tender Status

* The tender is **Expired** (Appel Offres Expiré)

## Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: CNST
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

## Trade Agreements and Regions
* Trade Agreements:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Quebec (except NCR/RCN)
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except NCR/RCN)

## Contact Information

* Contracting Entity:
	+ Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 Canada
* End-User Entities:
	+ Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
	+ 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6 Canada
* Contact Person: Julien Ratte (SPAC/PSPC), julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, None

## Additional Information
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has posted a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the manufacture and delivery of dolosse to Étang-du-Nord, Îles-de-la-Madeleine. Bidders may submit their proposals through the specified link. You can find more information about the tender on [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18015645?extsite=MTgwMTU2NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18015645?extsite=MTgwMTU2NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). The deadline to submit the bid is December
